display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=azCbgF-sGrAQ7kNvwFvayHZ&_nc_oc=AdmmRkvQ-Ia3W-EUl_BCJ4tplytQno4mPuHSxWRyYdsfcZtK0_RWpS86dobTmzCHOoY&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfqqA9WRqfnLJl2vxDzGe92uyDcI3V3ctCN6ri5I7Tml-A&oe=696158AA)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=R7g9fvyN0tcQ7kNvwGHTP19&_nc_oc=AdnN6EbSvVBpnY9_2yuDYFyqf__D3a0nt7WzC5glqHZeZMnVNOaHliV3mb4Jh9bKUPI&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfoDx8xtsb0ve1d6UvYZ07ibLASPP2RCyorSflFAOq_m8w&oe=69614912)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=px58t2yQTkgQ7kNvwF5PnNa&_nc_oc=AdkXTzbh-E0k1Ag3VrsKrZ5IR84Lr1hhkuDTq0J5yVy__MeqnUbicZVzt9rcAjJIz4g&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfraOzrRbn38tCOw6aI2SAFuEc_Lyp7-EudUkvxepGWXrA&oe=69614FED)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pSoYEHR-vpUQ7kNvwGqioqk&_nc_oc=Adl4WlxZ66TYwKLpZ-9xBGjm7t-MDe-9FiRZKFx6_OP3PrHY0t_8SsWRT2BdVUOZuog&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afqo0JvklDy8OAw1v0Bgym5tMpWuiV9LXPUTnApdh7RKjw&oe=69612C10)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
